message: I never could get into Dr. Who. But I liked the latest season. Thoughts?
I watched like the first four episodes and just couldn't get into it. @thauber seems to say that it gets good starting at season 2

I highly recommend watching from the first reboot season (with Chris Eccleston as the doctor).  There's a bit of camp and low budget feel, but getting past that I've found it to be tons of fun with some surprisingly deep moments.  They've got it all on Netflix.
